reports.title: name="DOOM" appid="379720" target_framerate="60+ FPS title="Fantastic experience (60+ FPS)"

data.game_display_settings:
#### Video
- **Window Mode:** Fullscreen
- **Resolution:** 1280x800
- **Vertical Sync:** Off
- **Anti-Aliasing:** TSSAA (8TX)
- **Motion Blur:** Off
- **Chromatic Aberration:** On
- **Field of View:** 104
data.game_graphics_settings:
#### Advanced
- **Graphics API:** Vullan
- **Overall Quality:** Custom
- **Resolution Scale:** 100%
- **Lights Quality:** Medium
- **Shadows Quality:** Medium
- **Player Self-Shadow:** Off
- **Directional Occlusion Quality:** Medium
- **Decal Quality:** Medium
- **Decal Filtering:** Anisotropic 2x
- **Virtual Texturing Page Size:** Medium
- **Reflections Quality:** Medium
- **Particles Quality:** Medium
- **Compute Shaders:** Off
- **Motion Blur Quality:** Low
- **Depth of Field:** Off
- **Depth of Field Antialiasing:** Off
- **HDR Bloom:** On
- **Lens Flare:** Off
- **Lens Dirt:** Off
- **Rendering Mode:** Default
- **Sharpening Amount:** 2.0
- **Film Grain:** 1.0
- **UI Quality:** 100%
data.additional_notes: Both arcade levels and the campaign run fantastic! I experienced little to no issues during gameplay. 90 FPS for the OLED is possible if you turn down the settings further.
